name: Emoji Invaders (ZomBCool)
description:
Space Invader scrolling shmup made using the MYSHMUP online game engine:-

myshmup

Made for the OpenGameArt Spring Jam 2022:-

OpenGameArt Spring Game Jam 2022 - itch.io

Featuring custom emoji's that were created for the MYSHMUP Discord server. Come join us for chat about the MYSHMUP game engine:-

https://discord.gg/JPwTgP5nRH
